name: Creature Crit
description:
I would love to hear your feedback Play Fullscreen for best experience Product Overview

A mixture of Collectible Card Game and Darkest Dungeon style combat, with dungeon exploration that mimics elements of Slay the Spire and Darkest dungeon and an unique deck building experience that borrows from Pokemon’s capturing mechanic.

You are the evil Lord-Necromancer capable of possessing worldly creatures.

To feed your desire for power, you need to keep draining the essence of the living. This explains your crusade to enslave and possess all the creatures on earth.
